subject: RE: Help please - Insights and Events page of website
preview: Hi Lori,  Hope you're having a lovely day!  Apologies for the slow reply, and we really appreciate your patience. We're all set to go ahead with: Removing the filler categories Renaming “Learning Hu

full_threads.body:
Hi Lori,

Hope you're having a lovely day!

Apologies for the slow reply, and we really appreciate your patience. We're all set to go ahead with:
  1. Removing the filler categories
  2. Renaming “Learning Hub” to “Knowledge Centre”

Also, based on past experiences with most of our clients, a Loom video works best for sharing feedback or specific requests. It helps us quickly relay things to the right team member without anything getting lost in translation.

If that sounds good to you, here’s a quick guide to recording one:
  1. Go to loom.com and sign in (or create a free account if you don’t have one yet).
  2. Click “Record a Video” – you can record your screen, camera, or both.
  3. Walk us through any feedback or updates you'd like to see.
  4. When done, please send over the shareable link that Loom provides.

Hope this helps! Let me know if you'd prefer to share feedback another way—totally happy to work with whatever’s easiest for you!

action.text: Allie Borcena moved this conversation from the Wolf IQ inbox

full_threads.body:
Hi Joy,

I've had a bit of a play around today -

There are still quite a few sections of filler content I can see, especially when choosing categories? This will all need to be removed / updated.

'

The graphics used don't match our brand style, so I'll need to have a think about these (which I can work on)

The 'Learning Hub was supposed to be titled knowledge centre.

Can we please meet for half an hour online next week so you can run me through it?

Kind regards,



Lori Hoffmann

MARKETING + COMMUNICATIONS

T 02 9132 5900 D 02 9925 7204

certe.com.au
Closing ticket while waiting for the client's feedback.

Hi Lori,

Hope you are having a lovely day!

Just a quick check-in to see what you think of the updated Insights & Events page:
👉https://www.certe.com.au/insights-and-events/

We’re excited to get it live and would love your thoughts before deploying.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Can you confirm if this is what we are aiming for in the Learning Hub?

👉https://www.certe.com.au/insights-and-events/

We’d love your feedback — if everything looks good, we’re ready to push it live.

Could they sit under the knowledge centre tab? Or would that not work until we had other video content in there?

Lori Hoffmann
